WorkItem.Description:
Leggings of the Haggard Apprentice  -  http://www.wowhead.com/?item=47185    (cloth pants from reg 5man ToC)
 
In the last few versions of Rawr, this item has not had the socket bonus.   Updating from the armory or wowhead does not fix it, even though the socket bonus is showing correctly on wowhead.  
 
Must be some sort of parsing error (or a problem with Wowheads item data or something)
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Socket bonus not importing correctly on this item

Comments.Message: Might be related. The Socket bonus on the Windrunner's Headpiece of Triumph (ID 48257) is missing as well. (Should have AP +16).
I came across the Windrunner's Headpiece as well and came to add it but you beat me to it.  This was still with the current version.
